aboutUs.title: About Vibe Hub
aboutUs.headline: Where the vibe of coding matters as much as the code itself.
aboutUs.missionText: Vibe Hub is a community-driven platform for developers and creators who believe that the 'vibe' of coding is just as important as the code itself. We aim to provide a space where developers can share their projects, discover new tools, and connect with like-minded individuals in a creative and inspiring environment.
aboutUs.projectShowcasesText: A place to share your creative coding projects and get feedback from the community.
aboutUs.gearReviewsText: Honest reviews of the tools and technologies that power our development workflows.
aboutUs.communityLoungeText: A space for discussions, asking questions, and connecting with other developers.
aboutUs.ourTeamText: We are a passionate team of developers, designers, and creators who are dedicated to building a positive and inclusive community. We believe in the power of collaboration and are always looking for new ways to improve the Vibe Hub experience.
aboutUs.joinUsText: Become a part of our growing community and start sharing your vibe with the world.

hero.title: Vibe Hub: The Developer Community for Creative Coding
hero.subtitle: Discover and share innovative projects, reviews, and insights in modern AI-assisted development. Connect with fellow developers and explore the 'vibe' of coding.
